REMOVED.Minister: State Minister of Paddy and Grains, Organic Food, Vegetables, Fruits, Chilies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promotion, Seed Production and Advanced Technology Agriculture
State Minister of Production, Supply and Regulation of Organic and Natural Fertilizer

ADDED.Minister: State Minister of Promoting the Production & Regulating the Supply of Organic Fertilizer, and Paddy & Grains, Organic Foods, Vegetables, Fruits, Chillies, Onion and Potato Cultivation Promoting, Seed Production and Advanced Technology Agriculture
Responsibilities: Assisting in the formulation of policies in relation to the subject of Promoting the Production & Regulating the Supply of Organic Fertilizer
Formulating methodologies for the timely distribution of technological crop systems, quality seeds, plants and fertilizer
Encouraging local production of organic fertilizer using local materials to international standards
Implementing a reasonable pricing policy that satisfies the local farmer and consumer
Developing crop harvest collecting and processing centres to add value to agricultural produce and export
